name: Holiday Swag Bag
description: The Season of Giving is just around the corner, and The Swagger Salon is giving you the perfect opportunity to give some awesome gifts to your friends and family this holiday season! The Swagger Salon Holiday Swag Bag consists of two (2) snapbacks, one (1) t-shirt, and two (2) pieces of accessories - for only RM150. As we only have very, very limited stock left in store, there will only be 50 of these super exclusive swag bags up for grabs - and all items will be given randomly (snapbacks, t-shirt and accessories). Don't worry, we won't be giving you any old stock (because we hardly have any left!). All t-shirts and caps will be from our latest collections, and all you have to do is select the size for the t-shirt. T-shirts are available in both Male and Female sizes, and the swag bags are limited to 50 sets only. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI Sketchbook Series - Soefara #01
description: The LANSI Sketchbook Series is a collection of t-shirts where we invite artists to turn our t-shirts into their sketchbook. Soefara Jafney, fondly known as Sophie, is a full-time artist and awesome illustrator! From being fans of her t-shirt designs all the way back in 2006, we're proud to have Sophie as the first artist to grace our t-shirts with her art. Dabbling in all sorts of illustrations ranging from kids' cartoons to superheroes, her best-known (and also her favourite) ones would be those of her super sexy, and super kick-ass female characters. Therefore, it is only fitting that we kick off our LANSI Sketchbook Series with Sophie's wicked and beautiful renditions of our notorious LANSI ladies. Check out more of her work at http://soefara.carbonmade.com/. Available in male sizes only, and limited to 50 pieces. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Cool Grey" Batik Snapback
description: A follow-up to the first pair of LANSI "batik" motif snapbacks from our 2013 Q2 Collection, this second release comes in two new batik floral colourways on the underbrim. Made from solid high quality grey wool-blend fabric, the LANSI "Cool Grey" Batik snapback underbrim features a traditional Malaysian blue batik print. As each cap was assembled using different parts of the batik print fabric, each underbrim design will vary from others - with no two caps having the same prints. As this is an adjustable snapback cap, one size fits all. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Hot Black" Batik Snapback
description: A follow-up to the first pair of LANSI "batik" motif snapbacks from our 2013 Q2 Collection, this second release comes in two new batik floral colourways on the underbrim. Made from solid high quality black wool-blend fabric, the LANSI "Hot Black" Batik snapback underbrim features a traditional Malaysian red batik print. As each cap was assembled using different parts of the batik print fabric, each underbrim design will vary from others - with no two caps having the same prints. As this is an adjustable snapback cap, one size fits all. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: "Nice Guys" Tee
description: This shirt pretty much speaks for itself. A hit among nice guys and bad boys (and girls) alike when it first released as part of our "Tag Team" pack, "Nice Guys" is back as a graphic t-shirt this time around - and it's now available for females as well. Available in both male and female sizes. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Batik" Basic Tee (Black/Red)
description: Riding the floral-motif trend across the streetwear scene but with a Malaysian flavour, the LANSI Basic Tee is given a "Batik" makeover in two eye-catching colours - complete with a golden foil finishing touch in the details. Available in both male and female sizes. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Batik" Basic Tee (Grey/Blue)
description: Riding the floral-motif trend across the streetwear scene but with a Malaysian flavour, the LANSI Basic Tee is given a "Batik" makeover in two eye-catching colours - complete with a golden foil finishing touch in the details. Available in both male and female sizes. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: "Go Big" Tee
description: Like most things in life, bigger is usually better. And when it comes to a clothing brand as notorious as LANSI, "Go Big or Go Home" is just another attitude we live by. After all, big things only come to those who dare to dream big enough. Available in male sizes only. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Studs" Basic Tee
description: While we frequently release t-shirts in male-only sizes, we show love to our ladies from time to time as well. This bad-ass LANSI "Studs" Basic Tee is a female-only release, and features the LANSI "Swirl" logo made by individually-placed silver studs. Whether you see it as bling or as hardcore, you can be sure we don't make many of these. Available in female sizes only. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Black/Blue" Basic Tee
description: A staple in each and every of our quarterly releases, this LANSI Basic Tee comes in black with a bright light blue velvet print - keeping in line with our set of contrasting colourful prints on dull coloured t-shirts for this collection. Available in both male and female sizes. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Navy/Lime" Basic Tee
description: A staple in each and every of our quarterly releases, this LANSI Basic Tee comes in navy blue with a striking lime green velvet print - keeping in line with our set of contrasting colourful prints on dull coloured t-shirts for this collection. Available in both male and female sizes. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: Salon Basics (Grey)
description: The 2013 Q4 Collection sees the debut of the Salon Basics - The Swagger Salon's own range of t-shirts, following the reception of the NSFW collection which first featured The Swagger Salon as its own label. Just like the workwear collection, the Salon Basics features the stitched embroidery of the Salon Pole on the chest. A small start to the Salon's t-shirt line, no doubt - but you'll be seeing more of The Swagger Salon and the iconic Salon Pole in collections to come. Available in male sizes only. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: Salon Basics (Navy)
description: The 2013 Q4 Collection sees the debut of the Salon Basics - The Swagger Salon's own range of t-shirts, following the reception of the NSFW collection which first featured The Swagger Salon as its own label. Just like the workwear collection, the Salon Basics features the stitched embroidery of the Salon Pole on the chest. A small start to the Salon's t-shirt line, no doubt - but you'll be seeing more of The Swagger Salon and the iconic Salon Pole in collections to come. Available in male sizes only. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: "Loose Threads" Tee
description: Initially designed as a crew exclusive t-shirt, we decided to run it along with the other two Salon Basic "Stitch" tees as The Swagger Salon's first series of its very own t-shirts. The "Loose Threads" t-shirt was designed with our small team in mind, where everything at the Salon is managed and handled by each and everyone on the team, keeping a tight bond not only between the team itself, but also with the fans and the supporters of the brand. From the in-house stitching of labels, to hand-packing orders on a daily basis, we strive to keep a direct and personal connection between our product, our customers, and ourselves. Hence, there might be a loose thread or two sometimes. Heh. Available in both male and female sizes. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Stitched" Tee (Black)
description: The minimalist LANSI "Stitched" Tee is made for those who love to keep their swag subtle. Featuring the trademark LANSI "Swirl" logo embroidery on the chest, it's a perfect casual fit for any occasion. Available in male sizes only. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Stitched" Tee (Grey)
description: The minimalist LANSI "Stitched" Tee is made for those who love to keep their swag subtle. Featuring the trademark LANSI "Swirl" logo embroidery on the chest, it's a perfect casual fit for any occasion. Available in male sizes only. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Rockin' Red" Snapback
description: Since the first release of the "Rockin' Red" Fitted Cap in 2009, this colourway has been a fan-favourite and is the only other colourway that has been re-released, apart from the "Gold Rush" colourway. The third edition of the classic "Rockin' Red" snapback features the ever-iconic, and often-imitated, LANSI "script" logo on the high-quality wool-blend red fabric, with a green underbrim. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: "Tiger Style" Snapback
description: First released back in 2012, The Swagger Salon's "Tiger Style" snapback - inspired by, and made in support of the Malaysian national football team, Harimau Malaya (Malayan Tigers), is back. Made from 100% heavy cotton, this new edition of the cap features the same embossed embroidery of a roaring tiger logo on the front of the crown, and faux tiger fur mink fabric on the underbill. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: SCUMBAG "Kobe Beef" Snapback
description: The Swagger Salon has once again teamed up with Malaysian hip-hop underground legends The Rebel Scum to release the second wave of SCUMBAG snapbacks, following the debut release back in January which sold out within a week. Available in two distinct colourways this time around, each SCUMBAG headpiece comes with a copy of the "The Time Has Scum" album. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: SCUMBAG "The War Report" Snapback
description: The Swagger Salon has once again teamed up with Malaysian hip-hop underground legends The Rebel Scum to release the second wave of SCUMBAG snapbacks, following the debut release back in January which sold out within a week. Available in two distinct colourways this time around, each SCUMBAG headpiece comes with a copy of the "The Time Has Scum" album. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Gold Rush" Snapback
description: This gold on black LANSI snapback colourway is bound to spark a gold rush. Apart from the solid black wool-blend fabric for the cap, each snapback features a unique underbrim made from high-quality golden fabrics from across the South East Asian region. Cop the LANSI "Gold Rush" Snapback along with the matching t-shirt colourway in the exclusive 2013 "Gold Rush" Swag Bag, including other golden goodies, for RM 120 - with only 120 Swag Bags up for grabs. Time to rock some golden goodness, cos you know that gold never gets old. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: NSFW x TAIKOR - Denim Grey
description: NSFW is The Swagger Salon's debut cut and sew line, made from soft denim fabric specifically sourced to suit the humid Malaysian weather. A special crossover edition with our notorious TAIKOR line, the shirt features a stitched embroidery of the infamous Bat & Cleaver logo as well as quality wooden buttons, to give this casual work-shirt a touch of style for all the Big Brothers who run the game. And that's what makes it a Nice Shirt For Work. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: NSFW - Denim Blue
description: NSFW is The Swagger Salon's debut cut and sew line, made from soft denim fabric specifically sourced to suit the humid Malaysian weather. Featuring a stitched embroidery of the Salon Pole logo as well as quality wooden buttons, this casual work-shirt drops subtle hints of style and attitude, along with a certain exclusivity of a shirt only for those "in-the-know". And that's what makes it a Nice Shirt For Work. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: NSFW - Denim Red
description: NSFW is The Swagger Salon's debut cut and sew line, made from soft denim fabric specifically sourced to suit the humid Malaysian weather. Featuring a stitched embroidery of the Salon Pole logo as well as quality wooden buttons, this casual work-shirt drops subtle hints of style and attitude, along with a certain exclusivity of a shirt only for those "in-the-know". And that's what makes it a Nice Shirt For Work. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Ambigram" Tee
description: No, we're not the Illuminati. We're the Illumilansi. Heh. Ambigrams have always been one of those awesome typography and design techniques that are easier to admire than to execute. Therefore we just had to challenge ourselves to get one done. The LANSI "Ambigram" tee is printed using silver foil on our all-time favourite black cotton t-shirts. If you happen to have a waist that's the size of an average human neck (and arms down low), you can choose to wear the shirt upside-down instead. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Gold Rush" Basic Tee
description: You just can't say no to a classic. The LANSI "Gold Rush" was the first t-shirt colourway for our basic tees when they were introduced back in 2010. Among the fastest selling t-shirts in our collection, the "Gold Rush" tee has been reintroduced back in 2012, and this edition marks its fourth release. Cop the LANSI "Gold Rush" Basic Tee along with the matching snapback colourway in the exclusive 2013 "Gold Rush" Swag Bag, including other golden goodies, for RM 120 - with only 120 Swag Bags up for grabs. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Shades of Grey" (Black)
description: Each LANSI quarterly-release isn't complete without a "Shades of Grey" Basic Tee. This time around, we're going charcoal with a black edition of the "Shades of Grey" with suede printing on our improved melange cotton fabric - heavier yet softer than usual. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Showdown" Tee (Black)
description: Streetwear, and the apparel industry in general, is one hell of an entertaining show. Vicious, competitive, and more often than not, unoriginal. So while the big guys and the new kids on the block compete it out, be it ripping off ideas and designs, or making themselves a plastic copy of other iconic brands or trends, we just sit back, chill out, and enjoy the spectacle. It gets kind of entertaining, when you know what's going on in this little streetwear circus. Maybe, just maybe, that's the story behind this circus-inspired design. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Showdown" Tee (White)
description: Streetwear, and the apparel industry in general, is one hell of an entertaining show. Vicious, competitive, and more often than not, unoriginal. So while the big guys and the new kids on the block compete it out, be it ripping off ideas and designs, or making themselves a plastic copy of other iconic brands or trends, we just sit back, chill out, and enjoy the spectacle. It gets kind of entertaining, when you know what's going on in this little streetwear circus. Maybe, just maybe, that's the story behind this circus-inspired design. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Gold Rush" Ambigram Tee
description: With the first LANSI "Ambigram" tee being sold out in less than a week, we knew we had to be responsible for mending some broken hearts. No, we're not the Illuminati. We're the Illumilansi. And if you happen to have a waist that's the size of an average human neck (and arms down low), you can choose to wear the shirt upside-down instead. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Tag Team" Pack - Drips (Red)
description: Regular followers of the brand would know that LANSI pretty much grew from a hip-hop background, graffiti art in particular. Therefore it would be hard to resist from dropping a graffiti-inspired t-shirt pack. The "Drips" tee pays homage to all-things-graffiti - from the tagging beginnings of the brand, to the "Krink"-inspired drips. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Tag Team" Pack - Drips (Black)
description: Regular followers of the brand would know that LANSI pretty much grew from a hip-hop background, graffiti art in particular. Therefore it would be hard to resist from dropping a graffiti-inspired t-shirt pack. The "Drips" tee pays homage to all-things-graffiti - from the tagging beginnings of the brand, to the "Krink"-inspired drips. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Tag Team" Pack - Nice Guys (Red)
description: Regular followers of the brand would know that LANSI pretty much grew from a hip-hop background, graffiti art in particular. Therefore it would be hard to resist from dropping a graffiti-inspired t-shirt pack. LANSI has always been about the attitude - confident, arrogant, egoistic, different, rebellious, fearless, and above all, being the best at what we do. These are also the traits of every graffiti artist, as well as who we are. Hence, we couldn't agree more to the mantra of "Nice Guys Finish Last". Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Tag Team" Pack - Nice Guys (Black)
description: Regular followers of the brand would know that LANSI pretty much grew from a hip-hop background, graffiti art in particular. Therefore it would be hard to resist from dropping a graffiti-inspired t-shirt pack. LANSI has always been about the attitude - confident, arrogant, egoistic, different, rebellious, fearless, and above all, being the best at what we do. These are also the traits of every graffiti artist, as well as who we are. Hence, we couldn't agree more to the mantra of "Nice Guys Finish Last". Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: Pins & Badges
description: Sleek gold lapel enamel pins to add some bling to your outfit. Pimp up your fitted cap, backpack or jacket with a variety of LANSI, TAIKOR and The Swagger Salon pins. Can be purchased separately or as a complete set for only RM70. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI "Indigo" Wool Snapback
description: A colourway slightly reminiscent of our original Premium Purple fitted cap from 2009, this new LANSI wool snapback is delivered in a dark purple hue, complimented by a baby blue brim to bring out the freshness. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: TAIKOR Hoodie
description: Move over varsity jackets, Big Brother is bringing the hoodie back. The TAIKOR hooded zip-up jacket features the Big Brother Brigade crest on the front, and a TAIKOR embroidery across the back. Just what you need to keep things all good in the hood. Click here for sizing info. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: TAIKOR Baseball Bat Keychain
description: We know how impractical it is to be swinging a 3-foot long baseball bat around, that's why this 3-inch TAIKOR baseball bat keychain is made just for you to carry along wherever you go. If anyone says it's cute, then give them a knuckle sandwich to the face until they're apologetic. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI x 28Spin Yo-yo
description: LANSI has always been about the attitude, something we can carry across different fields and yet still share the same belief and confidence in what we do. To kick-start the year, we introduce our first collaboration of the year with Malaysia's top yo-yo team and online store - 28Spin. The LANSI x 28Spin Token Yo-yo pack features two distinct colourways, the green and purple Acid Splash and the blue and green Brainwashed Blue, both individually coloured and made exclusively by the good fellas at C3yoyodesign Hong Kong. In conjunction with the release of the yo-yo pack, we're also dropping a special LANSI x 28Spin t-shirt in the Acid Splash colourway. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI Chrome Car Badge
description: Pimp your ride, or any other surface you feel worthy, with our shiny chrome LANSI car badge! Ride with attitude with our chrome 3-D raised bold LANSI logo on a black base, made from high quality ABS material with an adhesive foam back. Dimensions: 155mm (width) x 65mm (height) x 3mm (thick) For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI Car Window Decal
description: Pimp your car window with LANSI car window decals! Measurements: LANSI — 6 in (length) x 4 in (width) SO F*CKIN' LANSI — 10 in (length) x 2 in (width) For more payment options, please read our FAQ.

name: LANSI Gentlemen's Journal
description: Notebook. Sketchbook. Rhymebook. Or simply, your daily pocket companion to jot down your world domination plans. The LANSI Gentlemen's Journal consists of 96 sheets/192pages of blank 80gsm milky white paper, inside a soft bicast leather cover, as well as a handy pocket on the inside of the back cover. For more payment options, please read our FAQ.
